description:
When all other hope is lost, it’s time to break out the Last-Aid weapon pack. You are the last line of defense against the unyielding masses of the undead and you deserve custom weapons that reflect that honor. The red, white and gun-metal grey weapon skins for your silenced Sporting Carbine, Combat Shotgun and Battle Rifle will stand out like a beacon in the darkness. What’s more, this pack comes with a perfectly balanced unique hand axe, ideal for making sure those zeds stay down this time. 

This DLC includes:  
- Axe Melee Weapon
- Last Aid PAC-15 Sporting Carbine
- Last Aid S890 Combat Shotgun
- Last Aid HAMR-17 Battle Rifle
name: World War Z - Last Aid Pack
